title: Selena Gomez fans shocked at Hailey Baldwin Lose You To Love Me shade
text:
According to the internet, the pair are at each other’s throats (Picture: AP – Getty)

Selena Gomez fans have been claiming that Hailey Baldwin has ‘threatened to kill’ the star after the release of her new track Lose You To Love Me.

The internet truly is a terrifying place.

The Wolves singer gave fans a new lease of life after she dropped her new track, a ballad which many are claiming throws some major shade at her ex Justin Bieber.

However, all eyes were on Justin’s wife Hailey’s Instagram Stories after she appeared to be less than happy about the new banger.

Hailey’s choice of song had people shocked (Picture: Instagram/haileybieber)

Out of the blue, she posted a screenshot of Summer Walker’s I’ll Kill You playing on her phone and, while there’s nothing to suggest it’s aimed at Selena, some fans are taking it very literally.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘The song been out 20 minutes and hailey already has something to say,’ one unimpressed fan said on Twitter.

‘I know hailey baldwin did not just jokingly threaten selena’s life when her husband is the f***ing idiot that ruined selena’s life for years,’ another said.

‘Hailey is married with the man, and still insecure about Selena,’ one more claimed.

Selena went on to share a message on Instagram about the ‘enemy trying to tear her down,’ which some are saying is referring to Hailey.

‘I’m literally just laying down and thanking Jesus,’ she wrote. ‘Where my father has taken me and placing me is exactly where I am meant to be.

Fans are saying Selena ‘dragged’ Hailey in her post (Picture: SelenaGomez)

‘He said to me “Selena hold on, I hurt when you hurt. I cry when you cry but I will NEVER, EVER leave your side. Work with me, walk with me and watch how I do it.”

‘He always surprises me and I re-fall in love with Him every single time. In my worst moments, like awful, my most painful moments – I never stopped falling to my knees wanting and needing only His love.

‘See the enemy keeps trying to tear me down and it’s not gonna happen. Not today. Not the next…’

People aren’t too happy with Hailey (Pictures: Twitter)

The drama of it all.

In Selena’s latest tune, she sings about being ‘replaced’ in two months ‘like it was easy’ while also shading an ex for ‘singing off-key’ in her chorus.

Advertisement

Advertisement

While some fans have put their detective hats on and believe the ex in question is Biebs (after he featured on two of her tracks in 2013), others are claiming it’s the Weeknd. And some are simply having a good ol’ bop.

Selena and Justin famously dated on and off from 2009 to 2017 before the singer went on to date The Weeknd.

They reunited briefly before calling it quits in March 2018. By July of the same year Justin was engaged to Hailey Baldwin, with the pair tying the knot in September (and for a second time last month).

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Hailey and Selena.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Niall Horan knows people want him to date Selena Gomez
description: Selena Gomez fans convinced Hailey Baldwin 'threatened to kill her' after Lose You To Love Me release and Justin Bieber wedding.
